name: Misery of living and dying magic
shortName: Misery of living and dying magic
description:
This Singleplayer-RPG map is created after the pen and paper game 'Shadowrun'. It includes a character creator, regular combat, matrix combat, magic and almost anything you can imagine what can be on such a giant RPG map. The current status should be this at least: Interface: - Regular Combat: 90% - Matrix Combat: 95% - Out of Combat Interface: 80% - Conversations: 100% Functionality: - Regular Combat: 55% - Matrix Combat: 70% - Out of Combat: 75% - Conversations: 95% Map: - The main town: 100% - Inside of buildings: 50% - The wasteland and other things: 75% - Decoration: 20% - Complete map: 70% Character Creation: - Races: 40% - Qualities: 30% - Attributes: 100% - Skills: 40% - Equip: 15% - Spells: 10% Story: 15% Entire Project: 52% **Fun Facts: 30.03.12**
Variables: 1586
Trigger Actions: 15220 31\.03.2012: [Thread]() opened (Milestone I)
